document_data.name: Whitethistle
document_data.mainbody: '''Whitethistle''' was a shrub plant that grew in [[Neverwinter Wood]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
document_data.Description: Whitethistle was a low-bearing sprawling shrub with green leaves and small red berries. The plant was notorious for giving the runs to anyone who consumed it.
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], a traveling [[gnome]] [[bard]] [[Grobnar Gnomehands]] composed a catchy song about whitethistle of the Neverwinter Wood.
